title: SA Is Perishable
content: Situational awareness degrades the moment you stop actively maintaining it. Distractions, time gaps, and task-switching all erode your mental picture. The operational environment continues changing whether you're paying attention or not. Treat SA like a limited resource that requires constant investment.

mcq.question: An operator steps away from monitoring to take a 5-minute phone call. When they return, what is their SA status?

options.B: Degraded—they need to rebuild their picture of current state

mcq.explanation: SA degrades during any attention gap. Even if nothing changed, the operator doesn't know that for certain. They must actively rebuild SA by scanning and updating their mental model.

openQuestions: How long can you maintain SA without actively updating it? What causes it to degrade fastest for you?
What techniques do you use to quickly rebuild SA after an interruption?
